ExportExcel.name: logic.business.it.MonthTeamReport
ExportExcel.label: 工作日志-月报(多人统计)
ExportExcel.Sql: SELECT * FROM( SELECT PERSON_ID, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Dispose_User_Label('${DISPOSE_CD}',PERSON_ID) PERSON_NAME, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-1', QUERY_DATE||'-1') YI_NUM , BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-2', QUERY_DATE||'-2') ER_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-3', QUERY_DATE||'-3') SAN_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-4', QUERY_DATE||'-4') SI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-5', QUERY_DATE||'-5') WU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-6', QUERY_DATE||'-6') LIU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-7', QUERY_DATE||'-7') QI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-8', QUERY_DATE||'-8') BA_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-9', QUERY_DATE||'-9') JIU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-10', QUERY_DATE||'-10') SHI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-11', QUERY_DATE||'-11') SHIYI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-12', QUERY_DATE||'-12') SHIER_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-13', QUERY_DATE||'-13') SHISAN_NUM , BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-14', QUERY_DATE||'-14') SHISI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-15', QUERY_DATE||'-15') SHIWU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-16', QUERY_DATE||'-16') SHILIU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-17', QUERY_DATE||'-17') SHIQI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-18', QUERY_DATE||'-18') SHIBA_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-19', QUERY_DATE||'-19') SHIJIU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-20', QUERY_DATE||'-20') ERSHI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-21', QUERY_DATE||'-21') ERYI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-22', QUERY_DATE||'-22') ERER_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-23', QUERY_DATE||'-23') ERSAN_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-24', QUERY_DATE||'-24') ERSI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-25', QUERY_DATE||'-25') ERWU_NUM , BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-26', QUERY_DATE||'-26') ERLIU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-27', QUERY_DATE||'-27') ERQI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-28', QUERY_DATE||'-28') ERBA_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-29', QUERY_DATE||'-29') ERJIU_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-30', QUERY_DATE||'-30') SANSHI_NUM, BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_Team_Count(PERSON_ID, '${DISPOSE_CD}', QUERY_DATE||'-31', QUERY_DATE||'-31') SANYI_NUM FROM (SELECT A.DISPOSE_ID PERSON_ID, TO_CHAR(CP_DATE.Parse('${QUERY_DATE}'),'YYYY-MM') QUERY_DATE FROM (SELECT BS_IT_LOG_DI.Get_New_Dispose_Id(DISPOSE_ID,DISPOSE_CD) DISPOSE_ID, DISPOSE_CD,IS_VALID FROM BS_IT_LOG) A WHERE A.DISPOSE_CD = '${DISPOSE_CD}' AND A.IS_VALID='Y' GROUP BY A.DISPOSE_ID))
